title: Apple’s latest patents reveal that the company has plans to introduce its own game controller
content:
Apple has been slowly investing in gaming content with Apple Arcade, but there is still a whole market that the company could explore – and maybe it will. The company’s latest patents reveal that it has plans to introduce its own game controller.

description: Multiple patents related to game controllers have been granted to Apple by the US Patent & Trademark Office in the past two weeks.
